CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Desktop Users relative to Premium Users?
SRP.A: Desktop Users is {below} Premium Users in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Mobile Users relative to Desktop Users?
SRP.A: Mobile Users is {below} Desktop Users in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Premium Users relative to Mobile Users?
SRP.A: Premium Users is {above} Mobile Users in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total average watch time?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Premium Users}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total average watch time?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Free Users}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Premium Users's minimum Average Watch Time in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Premium Users's minimum Average Watch Time is in {1962}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is New Users's maximum Average Watch Time in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: New Users's maximum Average Watch Time is in {1984}.

NC.Q: Between 1970 and 1983, did the total Average Watch Time experience a larger or smaller change than between 1965 and 1981?
NC.A: The change in total average watch time between 1970 and 1983 was {larger} than between 1965 and 1981.

NC.Q: Between 1969 and 1980, was the average total Average Watch Time higher or lower than between 1970 and 1973?
NC.A: The average total average watch time between 1969 and 1980 was {higher} than between 1970 and 1973.

NC.Q: Was the total Average Watch Time in 1964 higher or lower than in 1974?
NC.A: The total average watch time in 1964 was {lower} than in 1974.

NC.Q: Between 1962 and 1978, was the average total Average Watch Time higher or lower than between 1971 and 1981?
NC.A: The average total average watch time between 1962 and 1978 was {lower} than between 1971 and 1981.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {Premium Users} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did Premium Users and New Users first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: Premium Users and New Users did not exchange leading positions.
